Name: Inferno Breath
Desc: Summons an ancient dragon that breathes fire, leaving a trail of fire that deals continuous damage to those on it. The trail of fire does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.

H.Old:
MP Cost: 70. Creates several Trails of Fire after attacking up to 15 enemies at 300% damage 8 times.
Trail of Fire attacks up to 6 enemies at 200% damage at regular intervals for 20 sec.
Cooldown 20 sec
H.New:
MP Cost: 70. Attacks up to 15 enemies at 970% Damage 14 times, and then creates multiple flames.
The flames periodically attack up to 6 enemies at 240% Damage for 20 sec.
Cooldown: 20 sec.
